Package org.apache.openjpa.persistence

Annotation Type PersistentMap

@Target({METHOD,FIELD}) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface PersistentMap
Metadata annotation for a persistent map field.
Since:
0.4.0
Author:
Abe White
